data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Khakass an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Khakass, Russia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Khakass a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 7,791 believers in Khakass against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
God, we pray for the believers in Khakass, Russia to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Teleut people.
Spirit, guide the 7,791 believers in the state of Khakass into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Khakass, Russia find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.section_summary:
the state of Khakass, Russia has a population of 532,400.

We estimate Khakass has 7,791 people who might know Jesus, 298,827 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 225,782 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 532,400 people living in Khakass through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.
